short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Selectlix: Effortlessly Copy Netflix Subtitles for Language Learning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Selectlix is a lightweight yet powerful browser extension designed to enhance your Netflix experience, especially for language learners. With Selectlix, you can easily copy subtitles, making it an ideal tool for those studying languages with non-Latin scripts like Russian, Hindi, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, or similar.

Key Features:
✅ Copy Entire Subtitles in One Click
 Instantly copy all subtitles on screen with a single mouse click.

✅ Selective Text Copying
 Highlight and copy specific parts of any subtitle, just like regular text. Perfect for focusing on key phrases or words.

✅ Toggle Overlay Elements
 Easily enable or disable overlay elements.

✅ Customize Appearance
 Personalize the look and feel of overlay and popup elements to suit your preferences.
